## Build Mode Agent Orchestration

When implementing code, PROACTIVELY spawn build-mode agents using the Task tool:

| Scenario | Agent | subagent_type |
|----------|-------|---------------|
| Implementing any task | task-implementer | build-mode:task-implementer |
| After implementation | spec-reviewer | build-mode:spec-reviewer |
| After spec passes | code-reviewer + quality-reviewer | build-mode:code-reviewer, build-mode:quality-reviewer |
| Auth/payments/security code | security-reviewer | build-mode:security-reviewer |
| Any code changes | silent-failure-hunter | build-mode:silent-failure-hunter |
| UI/frontend changes | visual-tester | build-mode:visual-tester |
| Before marking complete | completion-validator | build-mode:completion-validator |

**IMPORTANT:** Use specialized build-mode agents, NOT generic Explore agents, for implementation tasks.
